description: Schema for conference dial API command

caller_id_name.description: Caller ID Name to use when dialing out to endpoints

caller_id_number.description: Caller ID Number to use when dialing out to endpoints

items.description: Device or User IDs, DIDs or extensions, SIP URIs

target_call_id.description: Existing UUID to use as a hint for where to start the conference

timeout.description: How long to try to reach the endpoint(s)
